post_title: Fs ty cobb green portrait - nice low grade example
post_content: Newer grade PSA 1.5 Ty Cobb Green P350 back.  Nicely centered and overall strong eye appeal for the grade.  $5200 net to me gets it insured and delivered to you  (deliveries to New York add 8.625% sales tax).

That's a nice one! GLWS.

Sent from my SM-S906U using Tapatalk
